event.data: Skara Brae construction is finished in @.
Lothagan Pillar Site is built in # in @.
Gread Pyramid of # is built in @.
Gilgamesh Epic has been written in @.
Code of Laws is completed in @.
Rig Veda has been written in @.
Homer writes Illiad and Odyssey in @.
First Olympic Games take place in #.
Mahavira, the founder of jainism is born in #.
Mathemathicians in @ start using zero sign.
Bible is translated to latin in @.
First printed book - Diamond Sutra is made in @.
The Tale of Genji - first novel is written in @.
Westminster Abbey is built near # in @.
First merchant guild is created in @.
Thomas Aquinas publishes Summa Theologica in # in @.
Marco Polo publishes his Tales about his travels to @.
Dante Alighieri completes Divine Comedy in @.
Bible is translated into english in @.
Da Vinci paints Mona Lisa in #.
Sonam Gyatso becomes first Dalai Lama.
Romeo and Juliet is first played in #.
Rene Descartes publishes Meditations on First Philosophy in #.
Greenwich Observatory is completed ner # in @.
Adam Smith publishes The Wealth of Nations in @.
Human Rights Declaration is written in @ and signed in #.
First modern soccer match is played in @.
